channel.title: [718/728] DevinShire ~ All Skills ~ 17 Minigames ~ Highscores ~ Much More
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3aY1Awy.png[/img]
Hello, first of all i want to thanks Matrix for releasing his source, with it i could learn alot and finally code my entire RSPS from scratch (from the Matrix release until my updates). And now i want to show this fully custom RSPS, with Custom comp cape requirements, Fully adventure log for those who likes challenges, weekly updates, 17 minigames, all skills, flawless and unique dungeoneering with all chaotis & primals as reward, highscores, vote4rewards with flawless rewards, amazing economy, 1 week uptime, quests, all bosses, thats not all it has, look some medias for it!
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/axRxF3D.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mPLfm6t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N6zx43i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sPI96k5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kHKWcwO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K4OKlL9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AmUSHtl.png[/img] [IMG]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/7509/v4w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N9OeQPY.png[/img] [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/1529/6y0l.png[/img] [IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/2753/c7tw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lBDQ2Qv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OKzUAYU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VwFQsPg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8vk1HTT.png[/img] [IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/8354/koa1.png[/img]
All the things are unique, and coded from scratch, some ideas were gotten from RS, so you will love it, believe me. [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=What does it have?] Fully Dungeoneering with Tokens and Rewards. 1-120. Fully Farming - 1-99. 17 Minigames - 1 Custom. All Bosses. Adventure Log. (for comp. cape) Max Cape. Player Tasks (for quest cape). All Slayer Dungeons (from RuneScape). Fully Glacors 99%. Fully Ganodermic Beasts with Rewards. Fully Barrows. Veteran Rank from Killing 1000 Rock Crabs. Loyalty Store: points earning based on how much time you Play. DevinShirePoints System: custom shop with awesome Rewards from pvming arround DevinShire. Fully Herblore (Bob decanter etc..) Fully Dicing (all dices). Bob Fix all kind of armours and weapons. Fully Warriors Guild with Defenders.. Armoured Zombies Minigame.. Fully Hot/Cold Minigame.. Fully Livid Farm... with rewards. Fully Fight Kiln and Fight Caves... Fully Coded Bosses Combatscripts.. Fully Lava-Flow mining with Rewards.. Fully Automated DoubleXp, RandomRewards... Wilderness Agility Fully Working... Much more... [/SPOILER]
[URL=http://"http://devinshire.net/forum/vbcms.php?area=vbcmsarea_play"]Play Now! (forum register required)[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.devinshire.net"]Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.devinshire.net/forum"]Forums (to register your account)[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.devinshire.net/highscores"]Highscores[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.devinshire.net/vote"]Vote4Rewards[/URL]
If you like it please play, we dont have too many players because we are new, we hope you enjoy! cya. Btw we are 24/7 Cloud Hosted!
[/CENTER]

Hello, first of all i want to thanks Matrix for releasing his source, with it i could learn alot and finally code my entire RSPS from scratch (from the Matrix release until my updates).
And now i want to show this fully custom RSPS, with Custom comp cape requirements, Fully adventure log for those who likes challenges, weekly updates, 17 minigames, all skills,
flawless and unique dungeoneering with all chaotis & primals as reward, highscores, vote4rewards with flawless rewards, amazing economy, 1 week uptime, quests, all bosses,
